context_of_use: This use case allows power users to perform bulk actions to increase efficiency in their operations.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Increase efficiency in handling operations.
description: Allow power users to perform bulk actions (e.g., updates, imports) to increase efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to manage bulk operations.
assumptions: The power user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
The system has the capability to handle bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to manage bulk operations efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported.
main_flow: 1. Power user requests to manage bulk operations → System verifies authentication.
2. System prompts power user to select bulk operation type → Power user selects the desired operation.
3. Power user submits the bulk operation request → System processes the request and executes the operation.
4. System confirms successful execution of the bulk operation → Power user receives confirmation.
